message.content:
Breakfast:
- Chia seed pudding with fresh berries and unsweetened coconut flakes (No dairy)
- A cup of green tea (No honey, but you can add a squeeze of lemon if desired)

Snack:
- Carrot sticks with hummus made from chickpeas, tahini, olive oil, lemon juice, and garlic powder (No almonds, pistachios or cashews, use chickpeas instead of tahini)

Lunch:
- Grilled chicken breast served with quinoa salad made with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber slices, red bell pepper, and a homemade balsamic vinaigrette (No dairy or nuts)

Snack:
- Sliced apple with sunflower seed butter (No almonds, pistachios or cashews; replace with sunflower seeds)

Dinner:
- Baked salmon fillet with roasted sweet potatoes and asparagus (No dairy)

Beverage:
- Water or herbal tea throughout the day.

Please note that this meal plan is just an example and can be adjusted according to your preferences, dietary restrictions, and available ingredients. It's also essential to maintain a balanced diet and stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water throughout the day.
